name: Covid-19 Tracking
detail: Covid-19 tracking with case numbers, charts, news, map and basic information. An API is used to call the updated data

name: JavaScript Quiz
detail: A quiz about JavaScript, written in JavaScript. This app features a countdown timer and highscore tracker.

name: Password Generator
detail: Simple password generation application. It builds a password of a specified length using your choice of character types.

name: Team Builder
detail: This application allows the user to build a team of managers, engineers and interns from the command line.

name: Note Taker
detail: Enables user to write, save and edit notes. This application is deployed on Heroku.

name: Day Planner
detail: Day planner application that dynamically changes formatting based on the time of day.

name: Tangible Creativity
detail: Customer-facing website for a craft studio based in Baltimore. Allows customers to book and pay for classes, sign up for the newsletter, and contact studio management.

name: Utah Amateur Radio Club
detail: Rebuild of the Utah Amateur Radio Club website to give a more efficient and modern looking face to the organization.

name: Utah Amateur Radio Club
detail: Rebuild of the Utah Amateur Radio Club website to give a more efficient and modern looking face to the organization. Built using the Hugo static website framework
